channel.title: Should I get Moderated for This?
channel.description:
Ok heres the Story, Someone said they would give Rep for helping them. I helped them and at the bottom as a Joke I put
*cough*++*cough*
I honestly Dont care about 1 person Repping me, Ive helped so many people and not got rep, I dont care. I help people just for the sake of helping them. Everytime I log in, I have about 5 PMs of people asking for Help I made a Help Thread in here just because Noone was getting their question Answered in the Official one I've made 4 Tuts and I have helped Tonns of people, I give out my email address saying feel free to MSN me ay Help you Need (nirvana.marijauana@hotmail.com anyone feel free to add me on msn or PM if you need any help) So heres the Quote.. Im going to get Moderated. [quote="Mod Taharok, post:7, topic:89444"][quote author= Nirvana  link=topic=130785.msg1266398#msg1266398 date=1178356084] [quote author=I Hate U link=topic=130785.msg1266324#msg1266324 date=1178355134] Ok. So most of you know about the Haybale, door, attack dummy training method. Is there anyway to edit that to make it so it's somewhere else. I am willing to rep++ for that if you tell me. Thanks. I Hate U [/quote] look for the message it sends when you hit it it will take you to a case, change the case number of the dummy, bales, or whatever to the object id of the new object *cough*++*cough* [/quote] Nirvana, that kind of attitude will now get you moderated.[/quote]

item.title: Should I get Moderated for This?
item.dc:creator: @wonderguy6 Doc. Booty
item.description:
@wonderguy6 wrote:

The Guardian:

Even mentioning rep is against the rules, I don’t think I can get in trouble because I’m telling you its against the rules.

Lies.

You need to read the rules,

The rule states “No Asking for rep”

Talking about rep is perfectly fine.

Read full topic
item.source: Should I get Moderated for This?

item.title: Should I get Moderated for This?
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

The Guardian:

Even mentioning rep is against the rules, I don’t think I can get in trouble because I’m telling you its against the rules.

Rep isn’t against the rules. You’re pathetic, Moparisthebest can delete the Rep option easily.
Whoever said that † Nirvana † should get banned, well why should he? What’s so insulting about cough cough? There is nothing wrong with that statement. If it’s an insult, I would be delighted to hear about it.

Read full topic

item.title: Should I get Moderated for This?
item.dc:creator: @_Nirvana † Nirvana †
item.description:
@_Nirvana wrote:

} public int GetCLHitpoints(int ItemID) {
if (ItemID == -1) {
return 1;
}
String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID);
if (ItemName.startsWith(“Ahrim”)) {
return 70;
}
if (ItemName.startsWith(“Hp Cape”)) {
return 99;
}else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Ahrim”)) {
return 70;
}
return 1;
}

item.title: Should I get Moderated for This?
item.dc:creator: @pwned_i_lvl3 pwned i lvl3
item.description:
@pwned_i_lvl3 wrote:

instead of {? coz this is what’s in client.java

public int GetCLHitpoints(int ItemID) {
if (ItemID == -1) {
return 1;
}
String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID);
if (ItemName.startsWith(“Ahrim”)) {
return 70;
}
if (ItemName.startsWith(“Hp Cape”)) {
return 99;
}else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Ahrim”)) {
return 70;
}
return 1;
}

Read full topic
